chrome.scriptBadge

Top-Level Variables
scriptBadge: ChromeScriptBadge
Classes
ChromeScriptBadge

Use the chrome.scriptBadge API to control the behaviour of the script badge.

Top-Level Variables

static final ChromeScriptBadge scriptBadge

Accessor for the chrome.scriptBadge namespace.

Class ChromeScriptBadge

Fields
onClicked: Stream
Getters and Setters
onClicked: Stream<dynamic>
Methods
getAttention(dynamic details): void
getPopup(dynamic details): Future<String>
setPopup(dynamic details): void

Fields

final Stream onClicked

Getters and Setters

Stream<dynamic> get onClicked

Fired when a script badge icon is clicked. This event will not fire if the script badge has a popup.

Methods

void getAttention(dynamic details)

Brings the script badge to the attention of the user, imploring her to click. You should call this when you detect that you can do something to a particular tab. Do not call this for every tab. That's tacky. If the user clicks on the badge, the activeTab APIs become available. If the extension has already run on this tab, this call does nothing.

Future<String> getPopup(dynamic details)

Gets the html document set as the popup for this script badge.

void setPopup(dynamic details)

Sets the html document to be opened as a popup when the user clicks on the script badge's icon.
